name: rotexsoft/slim-skeleton-mvc-app
description: This is a template mvc web-application (powered by SlimPHP 4), that can be extended to build more complex web applications.

suggest.rotexsoft/leanorm: An efficient light-weight ORM for database access. See http://rotexsoft.github.io/leanorm/
suggest.rotexsoft/versatile-acl: A simple, highly flexible and customizable access control package for PHP applications. See https://github.com/rotexsoft/versatile-acl
suggest.rotexsoft/versatile-collections: A collections package for various use cases (supports strict typing). See https://github.com/rotexsoft/versatile-collections
